com.versant.util
Class VStatistics

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.util.VStatistics

public class VStatistics
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to allow you to collect statistics in order to measure, analyze and improve application performance. Before using methods of this class, a session with the database needs to be started.

Constructor Detail

VStatistics

public VStatistics()
Method Detail

autoStatsEnteringFunction

public static void autoStatsEnteringFunction(java.lang.String functionName,
                                             java.lang.String[] dbNames)
Collects and writes statistics when entering a non-VERSANT function.

Parameters:
functionName - The user defined function name.
dbNames - An array of database names. If dbNames is set to null, it collects and writes statistics for all connected databases. If dbNames is a string array of size 0, it does not collect and write statistics for any database.

autoStatsExitingFunction

public static void autoStatsExitingFunction(java.lang.String functionName,
                                            java.lang.String[] dbNames)
Collects and writes statistics when exiting a non-VERSANT function.

Parameters:
functionName - The user defined function name.
dbNames - An array of database names. If dbNames is null, this method collects and writes statistics for all connected databases; if dbNames is a string array of size 0,it does not collect and write statistics for any database.

autoStatsWrite

public static void autoStatsWrite(java.lang.String[] dbNames,
                                  java.lang.String comments)
Collects the current set of statistics for the given database and writes them to file with the given comment.

Parameters:
dbNames - An array of database names.
comments - A string containing comments. If dbNames is set to null, it collects and writes statistics for all connected databases. If dbNames is a string array of size 0, it omits to collect and write statistics for any database.

beginAutoCollectionOfStatistics

public static void beginAutoCollectionOfStatistics(int[] statistics,
                                                   java.lang.String[] dbNames,
                                                   double frequency,
                                                   int[] functions,
                                                   java.lang.String outputFile)
Collects specified performance monitoring statistics i.e. session, connection, and database statistics, associated with specified databases and write them to a file..

Parameters:
statistics - An array that contains the names of application, session, connection, and database statistics.
dbNames - An array containing the names of the databases to be monitored.
frequency - A time interval in seconds for updating the file.
functions - An array containing the names of function statistics that you want to get.
outputFile - The name of the file to write the output to.

If statistics is set to null, all statistics are collected. If statistics is an integer array of size 0, it omits to collect and write statistics. If the frequency is set to 0, statistics will be written to the file as frequently as possible. If functions is set to null statistics will be collected for all the functions.

beginAutoCollectionOfAllStatistics

public static void beginAutoCollectionOfAllStatistics(java.lang.String[] dbNames,
                                                      double frequency,
                                                      int[] functions,
                                                      java.lang.String outputFile)
Collects all performance monitoring statistics i.e. session, connection, and database statistics, associated with specified databases and write them to a file..

Parameters:
dbNames - An array containing the names of the databases to be monitored.
frequency - A time interval in seconds for updating the file.
functions - An array containing the names of function statistics that you want to get.
outputFile - The name of the file to write the output to.

If the frequency is set to 0, statistics will be written to the file as frequently as possible.If functions is set to null statistics will be collected for all the functions.

endAutoCollectionOfStatistics

public static void endAutoCollectionOfStatistics()
Turns off statistics collection.

This method turns off statistics collection begun with methods begin() and AutoCollectionOfAllStatistics() and closes the statistics file.

getActivityInfo

public static java.lang.Object[][] getActivityInfo(java.lang.String dbName,
                                                   DBLockInfo[] lockInfos,
                                                   DBTransactionInfo[] transInfos,
                                                   DBConnectInfo[] connectInfos)
Gets information about locks, transactions, and connections with given database.

Parameters:
dbName - The database for which to gather information.
lockInfos - Description of the objects for which to gather lock information. If lockInfos is set to null, it receives lock information for all locked objects.
transInfos - Description of the transactions for which to gather lock information. If transInfos is set to null, it receives transaction information for all transactions.
connectInfos - Description of the connections for which to gather information. If connectInfos is set to null, it receives connection information for all connections.

getLockInfo

public static DBLockInfo[] getLockInfo(java.lang.String dbName,
                                       DBLockInfo[] lockInfos,
                                       DBTransactionInfo[] transInfos,
                                       DBConnectInfo[] connectInfos)
Gets information about locks with given database.

Parameters:
dbName - The database for which to gather information.
lockInfos - Description of the objects for which to gather lock information. If lockInfos() is null, it receives lock information for all locked objects.
transInfos - Description of the transactions for which to gather lock information. If transInfos() is null, it receives transaction information for all transaction.
connectInfos - Description of the connections for which to gather information. If connectInfos() is null, it receives connection information for all connections.

getTransactionInfo

public static DBTransactionInfo[] getTransactionInfo(java.lang.String dbName,
                                                     DBLockInfo[] lockInfos,
                                                     DBTransactionInfo[] transInfos,
                                                     DBConnectInfo[] connectInfos)
Gets information about transactions with given database.

Parameters:
dbName - The database from which to gather information
lockInfos - Description of the objects for which to gather lock information. If lockInfos is set to null, it receives lock information for all locked objects
transInfos - Description of the transactions for which to gather lock information. If transInfos is set to null, it receives transaction information for all transactions.
connectInfos - Description of the connections for which to gather information. If connectInfos is set to null, it receives connection information for all connections

getConnectionInfo

public static DBConnectInfo[] getConnectionInfo(java.lang.String dbName,
                                                DBLockInfo[] lockInfos,
                                                DBTransactionInfo[] transInfos,
                                                DBConnectInfo[] connectInfos)
Gets information about connections with given database.

Parameters:
dbName - The database for which to gather information.
lockInfos - Description of the objects for which to gather lock information. If lockInfos() is null, it receives lock information for all locked objects.
transInfos - Description of the transactions for which to gather lock information. If transInfos() is null, it receives transaction information for all transactions.
connectInfos - Description of the connections for which to gather information. If connectInfos() is null, it receives connection information for all connections.

getStatistics

public static double[] getStatistics(int[] statistics,
                                     java.lang.String dbName,
                                     int connectionId)
Gets the values for a given set of statistics for a given database and connection.

Parameters:
statistics - An array that contains the names of application, session, connection, and database statistics. If the value of statistics is set to null, all statistics are collected.
dbName - Database for which to gather information.
connectionId - Connection identifier for the given database.

getAllStatistics

public static double[] getAllStatistics(java.lang.String dbName,
                                        int connectionId)
Gets the values for all statistics for a given database and connection.

Parameters:
dbName - The database for which to collect statistics.
connectionId - The connection identifier for the given database.

turnOffCollectionOfStatistics

public static void turnOffCollectionOfStatistics(int[] statistics,
                                                 java.lang.String dbName,
                                                 int connectionId)
Turn off statistics collection for the given set of statistics

Parameters:
statistics - an array containing the names of appplication, session, connection, and database statistics, if the value of statistics is null, all statistics will be affected
dbName - database for which to collect statistics
connectionId - connection identifier for the given database

turnOffCollectionOfAllStatistics

public static void turnOffCollectionOfAllStatistics(java.lang.String dbName,
                                                    int connectionId)
Turns off all statistics collection for the given set of statistics.

Parameters:
dbName - The database for which to collect statistics.
connectionId - The connection identifier for the given database.

turnOnCollectionOfStatistics

public static void turnOnCollectionOfStatistics(int[] statistics,
                                                java.lang.String dbName,
                                                int connectionId)
Turns on statistics collection for the given set of statistics.

Parameters:
statistics - An array that contains the names of application, session, connection, and database statistics. If the value of statistics is set to null, all statistics will be affected.
dbName - The database for which to collect statistics.
connectionId - The connection identifier for the given database.

turnOnCollectionOfAllStatistics

public static void turnOnCollectionOfAllStatistics(java.lang.String dbName,
                                                   int connectionId)
Turns on all statistics collection for the given set of statistics.

Parameters:
dbName - The database for which to collect statistics.
connectionId - The connection identifier for the given database.
